explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a woman in a yellow top and red skirt, wearing a Pikachu headband, smiling and looking to the left of the frame. Behind her is a khaki wall and a white door.

[0-5] Then the woman takes a step forward, stumbles, and her skirt gets caught in the door. She turns her head back, grabs her skirt with both hands, and tries to pull it out of the door. The camera zooms in; the woman fails to pull out the skirt, her expression turns distressed, and she raises her hands behind her back against the door, pretending to cry.

[5-9] Subsequently, a person in a blue and yellow outfit enters from the right side of the frame, runs over and kneels beside the woman, looking up at the crying woman. The woman stops crying and points to her stuck skirt. The person in blue holds their head in their hands and looks at the stuck skirt, while the woman in the yellow top clasps her hands over her stomach and sobs. The person in blue gestures with their hands in front of them twice and then turns to the right of the frame.
